Title: Chapter Seven: Lost Boys
Writer: Michael Connelly (based on the novels by), Eric Ellis Overmyer (developed for television by), Joe Gonzalez (teleplay by), Eric Ellis Overmyer (teleplay by)
Actors: Titus Welliver, Jamie Hector, Amy Aquino, Lance Reddick
Plot: Bosch struggles to manage both professional and personal fallout, as an echo of his past helps him discover pivotal clues in the Waits case. As the stakes escalate, a restless Waits hatches a deadly plan.
